exclusion:
• Set the Z-Wave controller in the exclusion mode (see controller's manual)
  • Press the "Reset" button 3 times within 3 seconds
inclusion:
• Press the "Reset" button 3 times within 3 seconds or
  • press 3 times on connected switch within 3 seconds
label: ZV-9101
overview: Z-Wave Built-in receiver with dimmer function. Control input, AC 230V / DC 12V, for Pushdim. Max 400 W resistive load, 200 W LED. Front edge / Rear dimmer, adjustable lowest level. Compatible with Nexa Bridge and other Z-Wave controllers.
usage: Control with retractive switch: Press once to turn on. Press again to turn off. To dim, keep the button pressed in when the light is on. The light comes on with the luminance it had when it was turned off.

category.label: Wall Switch
category.description: Any device attached to the wall that controls a binary status of something, for ex. a light switch

parameters.label: Saving load state
parameters.description: Saving load state before power failure
parameters.overview: Info: Saving load state before power failure 0 – shutoff load 1 – turn on load 2 – save load state before power failure

parameters.label: Enable/disable to send report
parameters.description: basic report to the Lifeline when the load state changed
parameters.overview:
Enable/disable to send the basic report to the Lifeline when the load state changed (When value set as 1, re-power on the dimmer, it will send Basic report automatically)

0 – Disable to send Basic report

1 – Enable to send Basic report

parameters.label: Default fade time
parameters.overview:
Default fade time (unit is second, this value has the same function as Duration of Multilevel) Valid value: 0x00 - 0xFF

Value Description
0-127 1 second to 127 seconds in 1 second resolution
128-254 1 minute to 127 minutes in 1 minute resolution
255 Factory default duration. (1 sec.)

parameters.label: brightness value
parameters.overview: Setting minimum brightness value Valid value: 0 - 50, the bigger the value is, the higher the load’s minimum brightness is Note: when configure this value, the value of Multilevel will be configured as 1 automatically so that users can preview the corre-sponding effect of minimum brightness value

parameters.label: MOSFET
parameters.overview: Choose MOSFET driving type 0 – trailing edge 1 – leading edge

parameters.label: removal from network
parameters.description: Enable/disable external switch to be added to and removed from a network
parameters.overview: Enable/disable external switch to be added to and removed from a network (when enables this function, triple press the external switch within 1.5 seconds to be added to or removed from a net-work) 0 – disable 1 - enable

associations.label: Lifeline
associations.overview:
The dimmer has accounted for Emergency Shutoff, when the temperature rises above 90°C, Emergency Shutoff is sent to Lifeline.

System (0x09) Emergency Shutoff status
